actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in projects to encourage the design, planning, and construction of the North Los Angeles County Regional Water Recycling Project in the State of California.
short_title: North Los Angeles County Water Recycling Act of 2010

summary.text: North Los Angeles County Water Recycling Act of 2010 - Amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the County of Los Angeles Department of Public Works and Waterworks District No. 40, to participate in the design, planning, and construction of the North Los Angeles County regional water recycling project. Limits the federal share to 25% of the project's cost.

titles.title: North Los Angeles County Water Recycling Act of 2010

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in projects to encourage the design, planning, and construction of the North Los Angeles County Regional Water Recycling Project in the State of California.
